text: Viceroy Yevgen [[Torrn]] leads the [[Tharashk enclave|Tharashk Enclave (Dragon Towers)]] in [[Dragon Towers]], [[Sharn]]. He also operates as a very expensive [[inquisitive]]-for-hire.
title: Yevgen Torrn
tags: inquisitive Tharashk humanoid Sharn orc Torrn [[Tharashk Enclave (Dragon Towers)]]
